word:
"Sunnyside," Cooranbong, N.S.W., Australia, February 18, 1899. 

     Preparation of a Pamphlet on Daniel and the Revelation. I awoke at three a.m. I sent an earnest petition to my gracious heavenly Father for His keeping power today; for we are kept by the power of God through faith. And faith is not of ourselves; it is the gift of God.
